Container.Name: mullvad-browser
Container.Overview: The Mullvad Browser(https://mullvad.net/en/browser) is a privacy-focused web browser developed in a collaboration between Mullvad VPN and the Tor Project. It’s designed to minimize tracking and fingerprinting. You could say it’s a Tor Browser to use without the Tor Network. Instead, you can use it with a trustworthy VPN.
Container.Requires: This image is unprotected by default __**do not**__ expose it to the internet. Please read https://github.com/linuxserver/docker-mullvad-browser#security for more information.
Container.Changes:
### 2025-08-26 - Suppress sandbox security warning as it's misleading inside a container.
### 2025-07-12 - Rebase to Selkies, HTTPS IS NOW REQUIRED.
### 2024-08-28 - Rebase to noble.
### 2024-02-10 - Update Readme with new env vars and ingest proper PWA icon.
### 2023-04-03 - Initial release.

Config.Name: Appdata
Config.Description: Users home directory in the container, stores local files and settings

Config.Name: LOCAL_NET
Config.Description: If using a VPN, set this to your local LAN IP range using CIDR notation. Without it you will be unable to access the web interface. If you have multiple ranges or a complex LAN setup you will need to manage this yourself in the wg0.conf, see the App Setup section for details.
